attributes.action: One-off payment of £500.00 to aid to each child during the Covid-19 crisis
attributes.additional_details: The coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak is having far-reaching financial impacts on individuals and families, it would great support for each child at this pandemic time.
attributes.background: To pay one-off payment of £500.00 to support each child during the COVID-19 crises

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to provide additional funding to support children, but it's not clear if you want these payments to be made to parents or children, and whether each family with children would get £500, or families would get £500 for each child.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
